name: Accent Zip Cushion
information: This cushion reminds us of the beauty of nature with its moss green hue and faded details on raw-like textured cotton canvas.

name: Bird in flight Cushion
information: A unique, head-turning decorative touch featuring elegant embroidered blue birds and a fun pastel tassel trim!

name: But first coffee Cushion
information: The perfect decorative piece for coffee lovers with a chic and playful But first, coffee print in black and cream.

name: Chenille embroidery Cushion
information: The invitingly soft feel and trendy natural aesthetic of 100% cotton, accented with geometric details in delicate chenille.

name: Dévoré velvet Cushion
information: Velvet adds a rich and opulent touch to any decor! This pastel pink piece is accented with white in an irregular-like texture.

name: Marled knit Cushion
information: Fashionable decorative embossed texture, warm knotted knit with a faded two-tone worn look.

name: Apple Butter Bed Linen
information: Crafted from a light and breathable linen, Airo is designed to be breathable in summer and warm in winter.

name: Airo Brick Bed Linen
information: Woven from a washed cotton, Stonewash has a relaxed and textured finish.

name: Stonewash Navy Bed Linen
information: Made in 100% cotton - a natural and durable material that becomes softer with every wash.

name: Kobn Clay Towel
information: Inspired by the muted colours of Danish culture and produced with the highest quality.

name: Kobn Rust Towel
information: Sumptuously soft, these towels are a pleasure to use throughout the year, they also air dry beautifully.

name: Kobn Sand Towel
information: The feel is modern and uncluttered; practical products that you’ll love to live with.

name: John Lewis & Partners Kastrup Rug
information: Hand-tufted and hand-looped, our 100% wool Kastrup Rug is offered in a unique, check design and features contrasting colours.

name: John Lewis & Partners Zag Berber Rug
information: Traditionally inspired, this indulgent pure wool rug was hand-knotted, making it the perfect way, and offer warmth.

image.alt: John Lewis & Partners Zag Berber Rug

name: John Lewis & Partners Zag Berber Rug
information: A striking diamond pattern runs and contrasts throughout and the textured finish feels great underfoot.

image.alt: John Lewis & Partners Zag Berber Rug

name: John Lewis & Partners Belsay Rug
information: Hand tufted, this rug has a luxurious feel and feels soft underfoot making it perfect for relaxing after work.
